com.oracle.truffle.api.interop

Class KeyInfo.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.truffle.api.interop.KeyInfo.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    KeyInfo
    Deprecated. 
    in 0.33 use integer constants in KeyInfo instead. For example KeyInfo.newBuilder().setWritable(true).setReadable(true).build() becomes READABLE | MODIFIABLE | INSERTABLE

    @Deprecated
public final class KeyInfo.Builder
extends Object
    A builder of bit flags. An instance of this class can be reused for multiple key info bits creation.
    Since:
    0.26
